text: 1:12 Daniel 9:24; Efesus 3:10; Hibru 11:13; 11:39-40God kamaghɨn men aka, me uari bagha ingarir puvatɨ, me ia bagha ingari. Ezɨ God uan nguibamɨn uan Duam anemadazɨ a izaghirɨ, ezɨ Godɨn Duamɨn gavgavimɨn gumazir Akar Aghuim akuriba God amizir bizibar gun ia mɨgei. Ezɨ enselba uaghan bizir kabagh foghasa bar ifonge.
